recipe.title: Carla's Citrus Marinade
ingredients: 1/4 cup fresh orange or lime juice
instructions: Thinly slice garlic and in a small saucepan cook in oil over moderately low heat until it just begins to turn golden. Remove pan from heat and with a slotted spoon discard garlic. Into oil in pan stir in remaining ingredients and salt and pepper to taste and cool marinade.
